title.narrative: Sport Relief 2012 - UK Aid Match - Slums

description.narrative: The aim of the programme is to help slum dwellers in Africa drive programmes that lead to improvements in their communities, including securing the legal right to occupy viable land (as tenants or owners), improved access to basic services, better living conditions, and the opportunity for slum dwellers to improve their economic prospects. _x000D_

activity-date.narrative: Start dates for individual projects within this activity are staggered.This is either the planned end date for the last project within the activity or the due date of the last report to DFID, whichever is the latest.
This is the activity's start date.

mailing-address.narrative: Comic Relief_x000D_ 89 Albert Embankment_x000D_ London _x000D_ SE1 7TP
